Academics

Academic Programs

A progressive curriculum designed to nurture young minds from their first step to the threshold of higher education

1

Pre-Primary

(Nursery, LKG, UKG)

Where Learning Begins

An inspiring and ultra-modern pre-school for toddlers providing education in a joyous, receptive, and supportive environment.

Learn More
2

Primary

(Classes I - V)

Learning Initiation

A trans-disciplinary educational program focusing on all developmental areas through activities, projects, and worksheets.

Learn More
3

Middle School

(Classes VI - VIII)

Developing Reasoning Skills

Focus on developing thinking and reasoning skills with balance between basics, skills, and knowledge.

Learn More
4

Secondary

(Classes IX - X)

Building Strong Foundations

Designed to inculcate self-learning skills and prepare students for solid careers through theory and practical integration.

Learn More
5

Senior Secondary

(Classes XI - XII)

Embarking on a Lifelong Task

Devoted to independent thought, ethical action, and specialization with streams in Science and Commerce.

Learn More

Academic Highlights

CBSE Curriculum

Following the latest NCERT curriculum as prescribed by CBSE

Smart Classes

Digital learning with interactive smart boards in every classroom

Activity-Based Learning

Focus on experiential learning through projects and activities

CCE Pattern

Continuous and Comprehensive Evaluation for holistic assessment

Language Skills

English, Hindi, and third language for linguistic development

Updated Pedagogy

Modern teaching methods aligned with NEP 2020 guidelines

CBSE Affiliated School

We are proud to be affiliated with the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), New Delhi. Our curriculum follows the NCERT pattern with focus on competency-based learning and holistic development.

Affiliation No: 1730604 School Code: 10950

Want to know more about our curriculum?

Contact us for detailed syllabus and curriculum information
